SEARCH
Package ca.mcgill.ecse321.gameorganizer.services

Class BorrowRequestService

java.lang.Object
ca.mcgill.ecse321.gameorganizer.services.BorrowRequestService
@Service public class BorrowRequestService extends Object
Service class that handles business logic for game borrowing operations. Provides methods for creating, retrieving, updating, and managing borrow requests. Ensures validation of request dates, game availability, and ownership rules.
